kokoro-v1.0.onnx.description: Kokoro TTS ONNX model for high-quality speech synthesis

voices-v1.0.bin.description: Voice embeddings for Kokoro TTS (56 voices in 9 languages)

notes.tts_disabled_message: Text-to-Speech will be disabled. You can download models later by running the installer again.
notes.fallback_behavior: If TTS models are not available, the application will run in silent mode (transcription only).
